questiontext.text:
power.php

  1. <!DOCTYPE html>
  2. <{3:SAC:=html}>
  3. <{3:SAC:=head}>
  4. <meta charset="utf-8" />
  5. <{3:SAC:=title}>Power<{3:SAC:=/title}>
  6. <{3:SAC:=/head}>
  7. <{3:SAC:=body}>
  8. <{3:SAC:=h1}>Power<{3:SAC:=/h1}>
  9. <?php
  11. function show($text, $val, $unit) {2:SAC:={}
  12. {5:SAC:=echo} '<p>'.$text.' = '.$val.' '.$unit.'</p>' {1:SAC:=;}
  13. {2:SAC:=}}
  15. $factor = ({8:SAC:=$_POST}['unit'] == 'mA') ? .001 : 1 {1:SAC:=;}
  17. $V = {8:SAC:=$_POST}['voltage'] {1:SAC:=;}
  18. $I = {8:SAC:=$_POST}['current'] * {6:SAC:=$factor} {1:SAC:=;}
  19. $P = $V {6:SAC:=*} {6:SAC:=$I} {1:SAC:=;}
  21. {7:SAC:=show}('{6:SAC:=Voltage}', {6:SAC:=$V}, '{6:SAC:=V}') {1:SAC:=;}
  22. {7:SAC:=show}('{6:SAC:=Current}', {6:SAC:=$I}, '{6:SAC:=A}') {1:SAC:=;}
  23. {7:SAC:=show}('{6:SAC:=Power}', {6:SAC:=$P}, '{6:SAC:=W}') {1:SAC:=;}
  25. ?>
  26. <p><{3:SAC:=a} {3:SAC:=href}="power.html">Do it again</{3:SAC:=a}></p>
  27. <{3:SAC:=/body}>
  28. <{3:SAC:=/html}>
